attributes.action: claw back expenses and squandered tax payers money bankrupting this country in the same respect that you are proposing to stipulate clauses on banker bonuses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
You, Gordon, have squandered billions of tax payers money. Where has all the money gone from your raid on the pensions/ your receipts from selling gold at record lows of $270 (the euro has not appreciated no where near as much as gold has rocketed) / your tax receipts from all that stamp duty you got from the boom years ?

You have squandered all our money and need to be held accountable financially as much as the bankers are !

rejection.details: When you refer to expenses, we assume you mean MP's expenses which is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
